landing.parrafo: When registering or login to Ladies VIP you are agreeing to continue according to our terms and conditions and Privacy Policies

card_new.p1:
I declare that: 
 -I am over 18 years old and I have the legal capacity to view, access, navigate.
card_new.p2: -That I will not allow anyone under 18 years of age to have access to the application.
card_new.p3: -That admission to the Adults category is by voluntary and personal decision because I want to access.
card_new.p4: -I am fully responsible for my access, recognizing and accepting that I can find inappropriate material for children under 18 years of age in photos and descriptions, without any legal impediment to this access.
card_new.p5: -I am responsible for complying with applicable laws, especially with regard to the protection of children and adolescents, committing myself not to use this category in improper ways or purposes.
